channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI Psychosis Is Rarely Psychosis at All
item.description: A wave of AI users presenting in states of psychological distress gave birth to an unofficial diagnostic label. Experts say it’s neither accurate nor ...

item.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq raises even more than expected, hits $6.9B valuation
item.description: The fresh raise comes in above the rumored numbers when word leaked in July that it was raising.

item.title: Meta unveils new smart glasses with a display and wristband controller
item.description: Meta showed off its newest AI-powered smart glasses, which have a display and are controlled by a wristband, at Meta Connect 2025.

item.title: Meta unveils its new Oakley Meta Vanguard smart glasses for athletes
item.description: The new smart glasses are geared toward runners, cyclists, and other athletes.

item.title: Meta launches Hyperscape, technology to turn real-world spaces into VR
item.description: Meta launches Hyperscape into beta, allowing users to turn real world spaces into digital spaces for VR.

item.title: Meta Goes Even Harder Into Smart Glasses With 3 New Models
item.description: New glasses with a built-in display bring Meta’s vision of the augmented-reality future into focus. The popular Ray-Bans also get an update, and there...

item.title: India leads the way on Google’s Nano Banana with a local creative twist
item.description: Indian users turning Google’s Nano Banana into a viral trend engine, from retro AI portraits to figurine-style selfies.

item.title: A Collision With Another Planet Could Have Allowed for Life on Earth
item.description: Analysis by researchers at the University of Bern suggests that water and other volatile compounds arrived on Earth from outer space—specifically via ...

item.title: Meta’s New Smart Glasses Got a Subtle Name Change. It Speaks Volumes About What’s Wrong With Them
item.description: Having left competitors in the shade by adhering to vital lessons on what works on your face, Mark Zuckerberg has reverted to old habits with Meta Ray...

item.title: The DOGE Subcommittee Hearing on Weather Modification Was a Nest of Conspiracy Theorizing
item.description: A House Oversight Committee hearing produced a flood of bizarre claims about cloud seeding, chemtrails, and solar geoengineering. Proven, human-driven...
